name: Kliniindeske (Planksandwedges)
description:
Kliniindeske (or Wedgesandplanks) is a climbing game, where you have to climb up caves by carefully placing wedges and planks to build a safe path to the top.

A tutorial about how to play is already built in, if you have any questions, suggestions, ideas, bugs, glitches, please write in the comments. I would really appreciate it.

Controls are basic first person shooter controls (WASD, space bar is jump, LShift is crouch). Other controls are listed in the tutorial.

I'll keep updating this game based on your response.
